questions.question: What do you offer with your Cloud Management service?
questions.answer: We provide a proactive and preventative approach for cloud monitoring, support, and infrastructure level optimization. Whether you are looking to fix issues, develop a strategy, utilize cloud-managed services, or any kind of modernize and secure the applications and infrastructure, Correct Space is the end-to-end cloud services provider that can help.

questions.question: How to Protect Yourself from Cloud Security?
questions.answer: Cloud security is a discipline of cyber security dedicated to securing cloud computing systems. This includes keeping data private and safe accessible across online-based infrastructure, applications, and platforms. We used best practices to secure the cloud platform like Web Application Firewall [WAF], NIDS, NACL, DDoS prevention, SQL injection, Rate base limiting, MFA, Private N/W infrastructure deployment etc.

questions.question: What is cloud computing?
questions.answer: Cloud computing is the on-demand delivery of computing power, data storage, and other services over a network so that you don't need to buy or maintain expensive up-front resources. Instead, your organization has access to a shared pool of resources that can be utilized when needed.

pages.title: Correct Space :: 24/7 IT infrastructure and software support services
pages.description: Correct Space is a trusted software development company with 10+ years of experience. Specializing in Cloud managed services, Kubernetes, DevOps and More!!. 24/7 IT infrastructure and software support services

blocks.title: We are a Strong DevOps Company
blocks.description: We are offering services under the Hybrid cloud, CI/CD, Docker, Terraform, Kubernetes, Infrastructure security, Monitoring, and Disaster management solutions. We also help to increase an organization’s speed to deliver the various platform applications and services. It permits organizations to serve their customers better and compete in the market.
